Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Abo bangakholwayo baze bathintela (abantu) ukuba bangangeni eNdleleni ka-Allâh, Uya kuzilahla izenzo zabo
Ke bona abo bakholwayo, benze izenzo ezilungileyo, bakholwe nakoko kutyhilwe kuMuhammad yaye kuyinyaniso evela eNkosini yabo, Yona Iya kuguzula izenzo zabo ezingendawo kubo, Ibaphuculele imeko yabo
Oko kungenxa yokuba abo bangakholwayo balandela ubuxoki kanti bona abo bakholwayo balandela inyaniso evela eNkosini yabo. Ubenzela kanjalo ke uAllâh abantu imfaniso yabo

Ngoko ke xa niqubisana nabo bangakholwayo (edabini) bageceni iintamo zabo nide nibathuthumbise ngokubabulala, emva koko nigcine abathinjwa babo nize ukuba niyathanda nibenzele inceba okanye nibakhulule ngentlawuliso de imfazwe yothule imigodlo yayo1. Lowo (ngumyalelo ka- Allâh). Kananjalo ukuba uAllâh Ebethandile ngezithabathele impindezelo ngokwaKhe kodwa Uye (Wayalela umzabalazo wezixhobo) ukuvavanya abanye ngabanye. Kananjalo abo babulewe eNdleleni ka-Allâh
Yena Uya kubakhokela Aphucule imeko yabo
Hini na nina bakholwayo, ukuba nincedisa uAllâh Uya kunincedisa nani, Amilisele iinyawo zenu ngokuqinileyo. (uAllâh) Akasokuze azisingele phantsi izenzo zabo
Kodwa abo bangakholwayo okwabo yimbandezelo kwaye Yena Uya kuyisingela phantsi imisebenzi yabo
Oko kungenxa yokuba bekuchasile oko uAllâh Akutyhilileyo, ngoko ke Wenze izenzo zabo azabi nto yanto
Kanti abahamba-hambanga na elizweni babone ukuba saba njani na isiphelo sabo babandulelayo? uAllâh Watshabalalisa (yonke into) phezu kwabo ukanti (okulindele) abakholwayo (ikwa) yinto ekwanjengaleyo
